An artefact formed in extreme temperature anomalies, has a faint constant ticking that seems to get faster when anything dies nearby. Not radioactive and has no useful properties. 
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] cannot be placed in a container

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]LETHAL TEMPO
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Killing stalkers or mutants infuses you with great power 
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]These buffs last for 5 seconds 
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[ui_red]Increases damage taken by 25%
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]1 COPY: Grants a surge of movement speed
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]2 COPIES: Grants a small general health regeneration
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]3 COPIES: Recovers slightly a random body part
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]4 COPIES: Recovers slightly another random body part
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]5 COPIES: Removes the 25% damage taken debuff
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]HIGH VOLTAGE
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stepping on an Electra anomaly will recharge batteries and active devices
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stepping on an Electra anomaly allows infinite sprint for a short period of time
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Having 5 copies lets you recharge Exoskeleton batteries
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES %c[ui_red](but also no)

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]MINOR LACERATIONS
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]You deal 50% less damage but gain the ability to cause %c[ui_red]bleeding %c[0,209,172,56]damage
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Low chance to make stuff bleed on impact
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Bleeding damage is proportional to weapon damage
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]YES
